promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a massive simple lynx dark-type pokemon wearing a golden mask. It can be found in castle-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, dark or lynx. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Goldlynxion, a a massive simple lynx dark-type pokemon. It can be found in castle-like environments It has the following abilities: Explosive Discontent, Dread End. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "lynx", "dark" or "Goldlynxion". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of dark-type pokemon, lynx-like, simple, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, violet shadows
generatedDescription: Roaming castle shadows, this colossal feline channels resentment into explosive displays. Its Dread End brings victory against daunting odds.
